title: parallel_for_2d fix and guarding avx/avx2 compilation
body_html:
Fix for #5921.

I'm adding support compilers that don't support -mavx -mavx2 by revisiting the dispatch code. This is work in progress, but I'll attempt to make it part of this PR.

I'm waiting for my remote devserver to come online again so that I can run performance regression tests. I'm currently developing on my Macbook.
body_text:
Fix for #5921.
I'm adding support compilers that don't support -mavx -mavx2 by revisiting the dispatch code. This is work in progress, but I'll attempt to make it part of this PR.
I'm waiting for my remote devserver to come online again so that I can run performance regression tests. I'm currently developing on my Macbook.
body:
Fix for https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5921.

I'm adding support compilers that don't support -mavx -mavx2 by revisiting the dispatch code. This is work in progress, but I'll attempt to make it part of this PR.

I'm waiting for my remote devserver to come online again so that I can run performance regression tests. I'm currently developing on my Macbook.
